project.description:
This job loads genomic (VCF) data into the HPDS format. it expects the following elements to be loaded into the /usr/local/docker-config/vcfLoad directory on this machine:
vcfIndex.tsv - a file describing the VCF file(s) to be loaded
All vcf file(s) described by the vcfIndex.tsv that will be read and converted to the hpds format
When this job is complete, restart the PIC-SURE services for access to the data.

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
cp /usr/local/docker-config/vcfLoad/vcfIndex.tsv /usr/local/docker-config/hpds/
docker run \ -v /usr/local/docker-config/hpds:/opt/local/hpds \ -v /usr/local/docker-config/vcfLoad:/opt/local/hpds/vcfInput \ -v /usr/local/docker-config/hpds/all:/opt/local/hpds/vcfOutput \ -e HEAPSIZE=20480 \ -e LOADER_NAME=VCFLocalLoader \ hms-dbmi/pic-sure-hpds-etl:LATEST
